name: Color Addict
description:
Collect as many balls as you can before your addiction hurt you!

Sadly, this game won't work on Chrome. Sorry for inconvenience.

Tutorial:

1. Collect colored balls by pressing the mouse or touching the screen.

2. You can only gain points by collecting that balls that are the same in color as the ring in the center.

3. If you collect a ball with a diffrent color than the ring you lose.

4. If a ball pass a ring of the same color without collecting it, the ball get destroyed.

5. If you lose all balls game ends.

6. Try to beat your hig score!

7. Enjoy!
